About This Page

The "My Groups" page is meant to list all groups the currently logged in user belongs to (confirmed membership).

It makes use of the following function:

  • Friends:Groups with type="confirmed" parameter to display a list of all groups the currently logged in user belongs to.
  • Friends:Groups with type="invite" parameter to display a list of all received invites to join new groups.
